snippet: Demonstrators interrupted the installation ceremony for the new Roman Catholic bishop of Osorno, Juan Barros, whom they accuse of complicity in a notorious case of clerical sexual abuse.
abstract: Hundreds of protesters in Chile try to stop installation of Bishop Juan Barros as new Roman Catholic bishop of Osorno; accuse Barros of covering up sexual abuse committed by his close associate Rev Fernando Karadima from 1980 to 1995.

byline.contributor: Elisabetta Povoledo contributed reporting from Rome.

lead_paragraph: Demonstrators interrupted the installation ceremony for the new Roman Catholic bishop of Osorno, Juan Barros, whom they accuse of complicity in a notorious case of clerical sexual abuse.

headline.main: Angry Protest Over New Bishop in Chile
headline.print_headline: Angry Protest Over New Bishop in Chile
